td.content: s:patient presents with 12 months history of Kidney. pt is a 33 yr old M. o:Height 70 in, Weight 171 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis.

s:white male optician aged 33 Ys presents with Kidney for 3 weeks. o:Height 70 in, Weight 170 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis.
